justification: "The Male Role Norms Inventory-Revised (MRNI-R …) assessed gender role attitudes."
"The MRNI-R is a 53 item self-report measure of traditional masculinity ideology."
"Cox and colleagues (2022a) … investigated … implicit gender associations (using the Gender-Career Implicit Association Task [IAT])."

topic_or_construct: Prosecutor perceptions of the crime, perpetrator, and victim
justification: "During the second study session, participants … reviewed the Case File and Criminal Statutes, and completed the Case Evaluation Form" which contained statements "to ascertain their attitudes regarding the case, perpetrator, and victim."
